analysis_instructions.pain_points: Only extract pain points related to the website itself (navigation, findability, content, design). Exclude app, Jotform, email, and organizational issues.
analysis_instructions.jobs_to_be_done: Focus on jobs users want to accomplish ON THE WEBSITE. Exclude jobs that require app, workflow changes, or organizational changes.
analysis_instructions.opportunities: Only suggest opportunities that can be implemented through website changes. Exclude opportunities requiring app updates, Jotform changes, or organizational changes.
analysis_instructions.pov_statements: Frame problems around website experience only.
analysis_instructions.hmw_questions: Focus on 'How might we improve the website...' questions only.

clarification_notes.website_vs_app: If user says 'the website is harder than the app', focus on the WEBSITE difficulty part, not app features.
clarification_notes.registration_viewing: Showing registered events on the WEBSITE is in scope. Event cancellation workflows are out of scope.
clarification_notes.event_information: Improving how event information is DISPLAYED on website is in scope. Backend event management is out of scope.
clarification_notes.search_filter: Adding search/filter to WEBSITE is in scope. App search features are out of scope.
